title: PreWork Study Guide
description: This was my very first dip into coding, a simple study guide for the prework of the bootcamp I attended.
feedback: Excellent start! Your HTML structure is clean and well-organized.

title: EconoMe
description: My Final Project of Bootcamp, a wonderfully dynamic budgeting app created using React
feedback: Outstanding work on integrating complex financial calculations with a user-friendly interface.
